name: lims-database-management
description: Database migration and seeding management for LIMS application

scripts.db:setup: npm run migrate && npm run seed:dev
scripts.db:reset: npm run backup && npm run migrate && npm run seed:dev
scripts.db:fresh: npm run backup fresh_install && npm run migrate && npm run seed:dev
scripts.db:production-setup: npm run backup production_setup && npm run migrate && npm run seed:prod
scripts.db:health-check: node -e "const {DatabaseManager} = require('./migration-manager.js'); const db = new DatabaseManager(); db.connect().then(() => {console.log('âœ… Database connection successful'); db.disconnect();}).catch(err => {console.error('âŒ Database connection failed:', err.message); process.exit(1);});"
scripts.db:validate: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const files = fs.readdirSync('./migrations').filter(f => f.endsWith('.sql')); console.log('ðŸ“‹ Migration files:', files.length); files.forEach(f => console.log('  -', f)); const seeds = fs.readdirSync('./seeds', {withFileTypes: true}).filter(d => d.isDirectory()).map(d => d.name); console.log('ðŸŒ± Seed environments:', seeds.join(', '));"
scripts.db:clean: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const backupDir = './backups'; if (fs.existsSync(backupDir)) { const files = fs.readdirSync(backupDir).filter(f => f.endsWith('.sql')); const oldFiles = files.filter(f => { const stats = fs.statSync(path.join(backupDir, f)); return Date.now() - stats.mtime.getTime() > 30 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000; }); oldFiles.forEach(f => { fs.unlinkSync(path.join(backupDir, f)); console.log('ðŸ—‘ï¸  Removed old backup:', f); }); console.log('âœ… Cleanup complete. Removed', oldFiles.length, 'old backup files'); } else { console.log('ðŸ“ No backup directory found'); }"
